notesStmt.note: A folio, possibly ephemeral, and not necessarily from a codex. It contains an list of 17 prayer verses starting with הרחמן י, in which the following verbs are ordered alphabetically. This prayer line is found towards the end of the Grace after Meals, with tendency for flexibility and improvisation, particularly in special feasts; In this list a line with the letters ט, י and ת are omitted, but a line starting with י are omitted, but a line starting with is added in the margin of the recto; sporadic vocalization.
Condition: non-consecutive, complete; versi are blank.
